1. User Interface¶

eProsima DDS Recorder is a user application executed from command line.

  • Source Dependency Libraries

1.1. Source Dependency Libraries¶

eProsima DDS Recorder depends on Fast DDS fastrtps and fastcdr libraries. In order to correctly execute the Recorder, make sure that fastrtps and fastcdr are properly sourced.

source <path-to-fastdds-installation>/install/setup.bash

Note

If Fast DDS has been installed in the system, these libraries would be sourced by default.

Note

This page is under maintenance and will be updated soon.
